channel.title: RS2 Cleaned (Useless)
channel.description:
Base: BlakeScape
Well, basically useless. No player rendering, just walks the map into the wilderness. Likely the client freezes by then, though.
Updates:
[ul][li]No longer run through map, you walk. Lmao, failed.[/li] [li]Items are no longer spawned over the entire map...[/li] [li]Source is a whole 51.2KB.[/li] [li]When you compile, it reads the java files from the folder Source, and puts the class files into Bin (Like the 508 version of RuneScape). When you run the server, it reads the class files from Bin.[/li][/ul]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/nmk9x1.png[/img]
Download: http://uppit.com/v/1BLYOMFT
FAQ:
Q: This source sucks! I'm not downloading! A: Good, I don't really give a shit. Go somewhere else.
Q: This source fucking fails! Learn to code! A: Go suck a dick buddy. I don't give a shit what you think.
Q: May you post more pictures? A: Fuck off.
Q: Do I need to use a certain client with this? A: Nope.
